mdRecord.dcterms:title: Casa Rull, exterior
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Doménech y Montaner, Luis (Spanish architect, 1849-1923) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The notary Pere Rull i Trilla of Reus contracted Lluís Domènech i Muntaner as the architect of his new house. The building was constructed in 1901. In 1996 it was renovated by the local architect Joan Figuerola. -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Casa_Rull_%28Reus%29 [work]
